description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry & Pear Individual Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Berry pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free,Pear
name: Raspberry & Pear Individual Pies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 sheet frozen shortcrust pastry, partially thawed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Cut 2x14cm round from each pastry sheet. Grease 6 metal pie pans and line with pastry. Prick bases with a fork. Line baking paper and fill with baking beads or dried beans. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove beans and paper. Bake for 5 minutes or until light golden. Cool.
Combine pear, raspberries, caster sugar and flour in a bowl. Divide between pastry cases.

Place a sheet of filo pastry onto a flat surface. Brush with melted butter. Cut into 4 long strips. Scrunch and place onto pie. Repeat with remaining pastry sheets. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Remove from pie pans. Serve.
